title: Revelations of the Anonymous
description: After hiding in the garage on a dusty shelf for nearly 20 years, Stacey Marcus has finally found the courage to reveal her painful truth with the release of her first book of poetry, Revelations of the Anonymous. In transcendent, simple words, Stacey has found a way to tell the story of her dark journey through tragedy into triumph. Written over a twenty-five year period, this collection of poems and thoughts is the voice of one anonymous woman’s genuine power to stir, inspire and provoke one’s peace of mind.
author: Stacey  Marcus
